direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods access elements in the list but perform different operations (retrieval vs. sublist creation).
Both methods modify the list at a specific index, though subList creates a new list while set modifies an existing element.
Both methods throw UnsupportedOperationException, indicating similar exception handling patterns.
Both methods interact with the list at specific indices, though subList creates a sublist while add inserts an element.
Both methods depend on the underlying list for their operations, though subList creates a sublist while listIterator provides an iterator.
